snippet.title: Demon Loop - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
⚔️ Wishlist Demon Loop on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2439830/Demon_Loop/  ⚔️

Demon Loop, developed by Magnolia Games in cooperation with Alexander Pfister combines the charm of a board game with video games. 

Take on the repeating Loop in this digital board game from the pen of renowned board game author Alexander Pfister! Protect humans from the monsters they had only recently called friends.Wield an increasing deck of cards to master strategy across each unique loop. Build and repair structures, rally villagers to your side and improve your own skills to overcome the demons running wild across the land.

Find out more about Demon Loop:
Website: https://www.magnolia.games
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/_magnoliagames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@_magnoliagames
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/_magnoliagames
Discord: https://discord.gg/c49KzZKxx9
